summary: COOLING FAN HAD INTERMITTENT PROBLEMS OF RACING WHEN YOU STEPPED ON GAS, NOW COOLING FAN IS RACING CONSTANTLY. I HAVE BEEN TOLD BY THE DEALER AND CHEVROLET THAT A NEW PART HAS TO BE DESIGNED. NO ONE KNOWS HOW LONG THIS WILL TAKE. I HAVE BEEN TOLD VEHICLE IS SAFE TO DRIVE, HOWEVER IT CERTAINLY DOES NOT SOUND LIKE IT AND I HAVE BEEN STOPPED BY POLICE THINKING I AM RACING ENGINE OR DRIVING UNSAFELY.*TS  *NLM      **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12-12-02 CUT OVER TO ARTEMIS**770110
